author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: الله ما نزّل فی الألواح است بقسمی که بهیچوجه از خود اراده و مشیّتی نداشته باشند اینست مقام توحید حقیقی از خدا بخواهید در
translation: It behooveth thee to consecrate thyself to the Will of God. Whatsoever hath been revealed in His Tablets is but a reflection of His Will. So complete must be thy consecration, that every trace of worldly desire will be washed from thine heart. This is the meaning of true unity.
